summary.long: 3 John is a book of the New Testament.

verses.text:
The Elder,
To dear Gaius, whom I love in the truth:
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Dear friend, I pray that you are doing well in every way and have good health, just as your soul is doing well.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Indeed, I was overjoyed when brothers came and testified to your truthfulness because you are walking in the truth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: I have no greater joy than when I hear that my children are walking in the truth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Dear friend, you are being faithful in what you are doing for the brothers even though they are strangers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: They have testified before the church about your love. You will do well to send them off in a manner worthy of God.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: They went out for the sake of the Name, accepting nothing from the Gentiles.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Therefore, we have an obligation to support such men, so that we may be coworkers for the truth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: I wrote something to the church, but Diotrephes, who loves to be first, does not welcome us.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: For this reason, if I do come, I will call attention to what he is doing. He is disparaging us with wicked words, and he is not content with that. He also refuses to welcome the brothers. He even hinders and puts out of the church those who wish to welcome them.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Dear friend, do not imitate what is evil, but what is good. The one who does what is good is from God. The one who does what is evil has not seen God.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Demetrius has been endorsed by everyone, even by the truth itself. We also speak well of him, and you know that our testimony is true.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: I had many things to write you, but I do not want to do it with pen and ink.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: I hope to see you soon, and we will speak face to face.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Peace to you. Your friends here send their greetings to you. Greet our friends there by name.
verses.speaker: Narrator
